resources.string: You can always access this information from the FAQ available through the drop down menus in most screens.
Your collection will be stored in the cloud to minimize the storage and memory requirements of your device. We need a unique, verifiable ID to authenticate your access.
Corvus is only accessing your email which is necessary for authentication and your user ID.
You need at least one collection to enter coins. You can set up as many as you need.
Currently, Corvus has only this level to split your overall collection into sub-collections.
Click a collection card to access coins in the collection or long-click to view, edit or delete the collection itself.
The reference collections can to help you identify coins and demonstrate our view of how to maximize Corvus functionality.
Currently, Corvus doesn\'t automate identification but you can key-word search both your own and reference collections.
You only need to enter a collection name to set up a collection.
You can upload any PNG or JPG picture to represent your collection; best results when cropped square.
We are working on making data input easier including uploading pictures from your computer and batch uploads from excel.
Your data is safe. Only you can access your collection and we backup our entire database daily.
